titles.title: Keeping Small Businesses Healthy Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit to small businesses for the costs of qualified health insurance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Introduced. Keeping Small Businesses Healthy Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain small business employers (100 or fewer employees) a refundable tax credit for up to 60 percent of the health insurance costs paid for their employees.
